name: Dungeon Rankers
description: Roguelike RPG meets Battle Royal! Fast-paced retro action!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
